title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah’s Terror Targets: Crucial Highlights from the Recent Military Operations in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Rocket launching sites, a military building, and terror infrastructure; the IDF attacked Hezbollah’s terror targets

Just a short time ago, fighter jets of the Air Force attacked a military building belonging to the Hezbollah terror organization in the Alama ash-Sha’ab area, next to the organization’s launching sites and terror infrastructure in the Kfar Shuba area.

Earlier today, IDF forces attacked to remove a threat in several areas in southern Lebanon.

During the day, three launches were identified crossing from Lebanon to the Arab al-Aramsha area, and four additional launches to the Mount Dov area, no casualties.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/44htvTz
